channel.title: Rune Maker, the server with a community [updated 3-24-10]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Rune Maker[/size] ---> All Updates will be posted on this page <--- As server progress and become more and more easy to run, people lose the intrest in running them as real company. I mean sure its great to have a bunch of friends on a server you run, but why not do it with a little class? Well now my friend Jono and myself are making a server that is run and kept perfect at all times. No more unreliable sources that could shut down at any time without knowing it! We have legal documents to copyright our site and keep Jagex at bay! We are starting a full community with a server for all and we will have 5 game worlds. We will have webclients for Runescape classic and 317 and 508,525,562, and HD!! We will never stop because there is always room to grow. To check out the website beta visit.
[url=http://www.Rune-Maker.com]www.Rune-Maker.com[/url]
~~Update and media~~
Site updates
Server Checker --- Beta version includes adding, deleting, online status, time up, time since up, and server name.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/vyxnc9.jpg[/img]
Custom made forums --- Beta version includes new toping, sticky toping, helper level (like rep) goes to 500, last post made, name of section, emulation area, message center, player sent messages, animated Icons, ability to upload 60 mb files to the site and share, if you get gold you can upload 2gb files and you get direct downloading.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2czx9j7.jpg[/img]
Game updates
New home area --- Donator portal, cleaned out all of the annoying objects like closes bank booths, added in smaller bank area, adding in portals, added in bankers and plants.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vql6a8.jpg[/img]
Graphic updates for game --- new ints for items added, new pictures for buttons added, dagon'hai set.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/294t0tc.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rune Maker, the server with a community [updated 3-24-10]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Glad you like it clockwise12, we will be going live with everything soon, and the site is being worked on by 3 people almost 27/7 and we almost have live support.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Maker, the server with a community [updated 3-24-10]
item.dc:creator: @Clockwise12 Clockwise12
item.description:
@Clockwise12 wrote:

Andrew this looks [b][size=18pt]amazing![/size][/b] Can't wait till its open! I signed up on the forums and ill help get some people to join :D

Read full topic
item.source: Rune Maker, the server with a community [updated 3-24-10]

item.title: Rune Maker, the server with a community [updated 3-24-10]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:2, topic:334006”]Without an intense advertising campaign and a excessive amount of dedication, this will fail.
Good luck.[/quote] Thank you, (for the last part anyway) We have the site, a 8gb ram dedicated server and 10 staff for the forums and 6 mods and 3 admins for the game. Were doing good so far and were coding a mysql file to give 20m for voting and make it easier to get your items when you donate. We hope to one day be what Moparscape has become.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune Maker, the server with a community [updated 3-24-10]

item.description:
@system wrote:

                                                [size=14pt]Rune Maker[/size]
                        ---> All Updates will be posted on this page <---
  As server progress and become more and more easy to run, people lose the intrest in running them as real company. I mean sure its great to have a bunch of friends on a server you run, but why not do it with a little class? Well now my friend Jono and myself are making a server that is run and kept perfect at all times. No more unreliable sources that could shut down at any time without knowing it! We have legal documents to copyright our site and keep Jagex at bay! We are starting a full community with a server for all and we will have 5 game worlds. We will have webclients for Runescape classic and 317 and 508,525,562, and HD!! We will never stop because there is always room to grow. To check out the website beta visit.

www.Rune-Maker.com
